reviews.text: Good room for the money. Kind of noisy at night due to the room being close to Rosecrans, a very busy road. A sleep aid helped! Room had kind of a funky smell, maybe due to food brought in from previous guest? Ideal location.

reviews.text: We had reserved two rooms and had told the clerk to hold the two rooms and that we were on our way to the hotel to register. When we arrived, no later than 30 minutes later, we were advised that one of the rooms was given to another customer. Then we were offered a suite at a much higher rate.
reviews.title: Poor customer service.

reviews.text: The kids later went into the pool and my mother almost got bit by a black widow. It seemed that all the chairs had not been checked earlier that day because there were several that we checked that had very visible spider webs and spiders. When we asked one of the workers to come and clean them he just came with a towel and was flicking the webs and spiders without even trying to kill them to make sure they would not be able to bite someone. He didn't even have any bug spray to spray the chairs with.

reviews.text: Very friendly and courtesy staff. Rooms are a little small, but very clean and with comfortable beds. Nice size TV and refrigerator. Also, a microwave and coffee maker in the room. Conventions location, just across from the boat harbor and close to the airport, downtown, convention center, and Sea World. There is an excellent new Japanese restaurant/sushi bar that just opened in the hotel which we thoroughly enjoyed. The complementary continental breakfast that the hotel provides is nice and offers a good selection of items. We will definitely stay here again on our next visit.

aka: Ramada San Diego Airport Hotel San Diego
description: Ramada San Diego Airport a family run business, just minutes away from the San Diego International Airport, offering complimentary shuttle service to and from airport, enjoy an array of restaurants such as Point Loma Seafood, Miguel's Cocina and Brigantine. Conveniently located within few miles to the San Diego Sea World, World famous San Diego Zoo, San Diego Convention Center. Explore deep sea fishing, whale watching just across the street off the Sport Fishing Landing.
